channel.title: Ham
channel.description:
i know this doesnt have much to do with mopar...but my ham is messing up and i went to the site but i didnt see help...i thought maybe someone here might be able to help me out...
when i right click on someone to chat to them on ham, i cant click it...it stays shadowed and wont let me click on it..can someone help me please?
